name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vintage box design and classic buttons, this unique robot brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its arms and legs are made from sturdy foundry materials, ensuring durability and reliability in any situation. The screen of Retrotron features a fun and addictive game of Snake, providing entertainment during downtime. As a member of the WebtrES club, Retrotron is always ready to assist with its impressive abilities and skills.
